message.entry: When the first input is a matrix, the second input must be 1, 2, inf, or \''fro\''. When the first input is a vector, the second input must be a positive real-valued scalar, inf, -inf, or \''fro\''.
SVD calculation of the 2-NORM did not converge at index = {0,number,integer}.
First argument must be single or double.
The only norm available for N-D arrays is \''fro\''. Alternatively, you can use PAGENORM to calculate the norm of each page of an N-D array.
